entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 20 this afternoon. Forecast issued 1:19 PM MST Thursday 05 January 2023
